summary: Its the Categorized Favorites Menu Extreme Compatibility Config version by Onigamibr compatible with Dawnguard and more mods.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=RED][size=5][b][b][color=#ff7700][u]ATTENTION![/u]
My user is lost forever, so if you wanna send me a message send it for OverlordBR![/color][/b]
Work with and without the DLCs[/b][/size][/color][/center]
This is a version of the great [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15797]Categorized Favorites Menu - Extreme Compatibility Config by whickus[/url], that was a long time dead. I has updated it to Dawnguard and added some of my preferable mod, but i still have a lot to add so you can expect for more updates to come.

I will be adding new mods compatibility in times to times. Feel free to ask me to add new mods i will put in a FIFO(first in first out) array of priorities.
But first I will be updating the current mods used by the former version of [b]whickus[/b].

[i]Recognized as one of the best gameplay enhancement mods out of 18,000 mods on the Nexus by[/i]
[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://SkyrimGEMS.com/images/badge_featured.png[/img][/url][/center]

• Installation
1 - Install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4862]Categorized Favorites Menu[/url]
2 - Install [i]Categorized Favorites Menu Oni Edition[/i] preferably through NMM, you have to overwrite the file when asks if you want to overwrite [b][i]favoritemenu.cfg[/i][/b].

• Uninstallation
1 - Unistall preferably through NMM or delete the [i]favoritesmenu.cfg[/i] and reinstall the original [i]Categorized Favorites Menu[/i] if you want to keep it.

• [b]Keyboard shortcuts from [i]Categorized Favorites Menu by favmenumodder[/i]:[/b]
- 0 to 9 with item selected: Hotkey selected item.
- Mouse wheel: scroll list
- Alt + mouse wheel: scroll list faster
- Ctrl + mouse wheel: switch lists
- (SKSE Required) Hold ctrl+shift to move by 1 pixel.
- (SKSE Required) Ctrl + w/s/left/right: Moves the menu up/down/left/right 5 pixels.
- (SKSE Required) Ctrl + f: Create an equipset from the currently equipped items.
- (SKSE Required) Ctrl + delete: Delete the selected equipset.
ps.: Unfortunately the repositioning feature don't memorize the position you left it, but maybe [i]favmenumodder[/i] will update this feature in the future.

[center][youtube]WghdKwGKeo4[/youtube][/center]

• Change log:
[v1.8b]
- Added DLC Dragonborn Powers, Shouts and Spells
[v1.8]
- Added DLC Dragonborn, equipment
- Added Forgotten Magic (Some spells may be out of place but I cant change it, without messing all my previous work)
- Added Obscuuri - The Shadow Folk v0.98
- Added Frostfall 2.0
- Added Realistic Needs 1.8
- SkyRe, potion fixes
[v1.7]
- Fixed several itens from SkyRe
- Changes and fixes on some submenu's names
- update of Jaysus Swords and Isilmeriel mods
- Added Spells of Tamriel
- Added Flintslock Rifle
- Added Firearms Sub-Menu where any weapon mod with rifle or pistol on it will fit here.
- Added Vilja Companion
[v1.6b]
- Fixed Races submenu
- Fixed scrolling of the Abilities Menu
- Fixed SkyRe Crossbows
[v1.6]
- Included Unsorted Menu
- Included Equip Sets Menu
- Skyrim Redone - SkyRe
- Cerwiden Companion 1.61
- Dragonkiller Cart Reloaded 1.83
- Bloody Facials 2.0
[v1.5]
- Vampire Lord spells realocation
- Fixed vanilla items showing-up in Spell list
- The Night's Embrace 0.8c
- Hotkeys Please SKSE BETA 0.11.0
- Royal Bloodline - Vampire Lord perk tree and abilities
- Eclipse - Power 1.01
- Fixed Bottle that Blood: item [i]Bottle of Animal Blood[/i]
- Liliths Reaver - Custom Sword and Greatsword 1.0
- Liliths Decapitator - Custom Battleaxe and Waraxe 1.0
- Liliths Sickle - Custom Scythe 2.0
- Liliths Carver - Custom Sword and Greatsword 2.0
- Liliths Disemboweler - Custom Sword and Greatsword 2.0
- Liliths Cleavers - Custom Sword 1.0
- Liliths razor - Custom Sword 1.1D
- Samehada
- Orcish broadsword
- Parsian Weapon Pack 1.3
- Star Trek Klingon Weapons WIP 1.1
- Bard's Lute
- Update of Apocalypse Spell Package to 2.02, gonna classify the spells better later, for now its on the right school
- Updated Keke Time and Space spell/power mod (both in power list)
[v1.4]
- Added 2 Versions of the same CFM list, just changing the font size
- Fixed some misplaced itens and spells
- Added Chrysamere
- Added Mace of Aevar
- Leather Backpack v0.5
- Added Conjure Rideable Ethereal Horse
- Added Empowered Magic 3.8, Skyrim Magic Overhaul
- Added Lost Magic
[v1.3b]
- Added Vampire Predator Vision Alpha2
[v 1.3]
- Added ACE
- Added Open and Lock Spells 1.2
- Added Sustained Spells
- Fixed More Hotkeys Please SKSE BETA - Cycling Key
- Fixed Dawnguard Heal Undead
- Fixed Dawnguard Blood Potion
- Belua Sanguinare items.
[v 1.2]
- Will have some changes on the distribution of the spells and powers on next update. Hope you guys like it.
- Dragonbone Crossbow Mod
- Some Powers from Custom Races added, still have to try each of the races to see if i lost anything
- Contemplated Races: The Ashen Race HD,Temptress Race, The Dryad, Dwemer Race by SuperJesusVSkyrim, Drakian Race, Dremora Race Best Balanced, Forsworn Race by IronPlatypusSkyrim.
- Belua Sanguinare Revisited
- Better Vampires Fixed Night/Vampiric Vision lost power
- Dawnguard's Vampire Lord's Raise Dead Fixed
- Dwemer Goggles and Scouter Equipment Fixed - My thx to @nathanj
- UFO Command Shout lost Fixed
- Better Vampires, "Call Creatures" should be "Call Creature" - My thx to @Rizzo
- Better Vampires, "Sanguinarem Reddere" should be "Sanguinem Reddere" - My thx to @Rizzo
[v 1.1b]
- Add Khajiit Sense of Smell
- Add Bat Travel Vampire Power for Dawnguard DLC
[v 1.1]
- Add Better Vampires by Brehanin 5_4
- Add Unexpected Blades 1.3.1
[v 1.0]
- DLC Dawnguard
- Categorized Favorites Menu - Oni Edition released.

• Recommended Mod to work with this mod
A - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14319]Better Item Sorting[/url] - 1 ESP file
OR
B - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14745]Item Rename[/url] by ananabsemaj - 5 ESP files
ps.: Install one or another and then install [b]Categorized Favorites Menu Oni Edition[/b] for last.

• Listed Items:

To Bethesda for creating Skyrim, and skyrimnexus for creating this forum.
To [b]favmenumodderSkyrim[/b] and his original [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4862]Categorized Favorites Menu[/url], that all of we loves.
To [b]whickus[/b] for his former version of the [i]Categorized Favorite Menu[/i] that i have been using till now.
